questions.question:
There are two elements x,y in a group (G,*) such that every element in the group can be written as a product of some number of x's and y's in some order. It is known that
x * x = y * y = x * y *x * y = y* x * y *x = e
where e is the identity element. The maximum number of elements in such a group is _______.

(GATE CSE 2014 SET-3)
questions.explanation: Click here for detail solution by gateoverflow

questions.question:
Consider the set of all functions f:{0,1,...,2014}\(\rightarrow\){0,1...,2014} such that f(f(i))=i, for 0\(\leq\)i\(\leq\)2014 . Consider the following statements.
P. For each such function it must be the case that for every i, f(i) = i,
Q. For each such function it must be the case that for some i,f(i) = i,
R. Each such function must be onto.
Which one of the following is CORRECT?

(GATE CSE 2014 SET-3)

questions.question:

questions.question:
Let x and Y be finite sets and f:x\(\rightarrow\)Y be a function. Which one of the following statements is TRUE?

(GATE CSE 2014 SET-3)
options:
A.

For any subsets A and B of x, |f(A\(\cup\)B)|=|f(A)|+|f(B)|

B.

For any subsets A and B of x, f(A\(\cap\)B) =f(A)\(\cap\)f(B)

C.

For any subsets A and B of x, |f(A\(\cap\)B)| = min{|f (A)| ,|f(B)|}

D.

For any subsets S and T of Y, \(f^{-1}(S\cap T)=f^{-1}(S)\cap f^{-1}(T)\)
questions.correct_answer:
D.

For any subsets S and T of Y, \(f^{-1}(S\cap T)=f^{-1}(S)\cap f^{-1}(T)\)
questions.explanation: Click here for detail solution by gateoverflow

questions.question:

P: Good mobile phones are not cheap
Q: Cheap mobile phones are not good

questions.question:
Consider the following relation on subsets of the set S of integers between 1 and 2014. For two distinct subsets U and V of S we say U\(\lt\)V if the minimum element in the symmetric difference of the two sets is in U.
Consider the following two statements:
S1: There is a subset of S that is larger than every other subset.
S2: There is a subset of S that is smaller than every other subset.
Which one of the following is CORRECT?

(GATE CSE 2014 SET-2)
options:
B.

S1 is true and S2 is false

C.

S2 is true and S1 is false
